fields.name: spotify
fields.template: <iframe class='listenIframe' src='https://open.spotify.com/embed/album/{0}' width='300' height='380' frameborder='0' allowtransparency='true' allow='encrypted-media'></iframe>

fields.name: youtube
fields.template: <iframe class='listenIframe' width='300' height='30' src='https://www.youtube.com/embed/{0}' frameborder='0' allow='accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture' allowfullscreen></iframe>
